gameState

Class Level7State

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameState.GameState
      • gameState.LevelState
        • gameState.Level7State

  • public class Level7State
extends LevelState
    Extends levelState and adds all enemies. Sends the player to the next level depending on what door they go through.
    Author:
    Trevor Aquino
